T02D3488:136b-1: badzra t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3488:136b-3: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs ;
T02D3488:136b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3488:136b-5: sku mdog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3488:136b-6: rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal //
T02D3488:136b-7: sems can kun gyi don rgyu'i phyir //
T02D3488:136b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
T02D3488:136b-9: 'dir lhag par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D3488:136b-10: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la t'am
T02D3488:136b-11: yig bsams la zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya'o
T02D3488:136b-12: // shin tu bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3488:136b-13: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te /
T02D3488:136b-14: 'od zer des rje btsun sgrol ma gdan drangs te /
T02D3488:136b-15: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D3488:136b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D3488:136b-18: sdig pa bshags shing mi byed par sdom pa dang /
T02D3488:136b-19: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3488:136b-21: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3488:136b-22: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3488:136b-24: tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas aom sh'u n+ya
T02D3488:136b-25: t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham
T02D3488:136b-26: zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsgom par byas nas
T02D3488:136b-27: gzugs rdzogs par bsgom par bya ba yang bsgom par
T02D3488:136b-28: bya'o // de nas pam yig yongs su gyur pa las padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D3488:136b-29: de'i steng du aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba /
T02D3488:137a-0: @137a * // zla ba'i steng du t'am yig yongs su gyur pa las autpa la dkar po'o //
T02D3488:137a-1: autpa la'i dbus su zla ba /
T02D3488:137a-2: zla ba'i dbus su t'am yig t'am yig las nam
T02D3488:137a-3: mkha'i mthil du khams gsum yang sgrol ma'i skur spros
T02D3488:137a-4: te / sgrol ma'i skus sa gsum na gnas pa'i
T02D3488:137a-5: sems can rnams dang gnas rnams kyang slar yang t'am
T02D3488:137a-6: yig de la de bzhin du bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D3488:137a-7: autpa la dang zla ba dang t'am yig yongs su
T02D3488:137a-8: gyur pa las rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i skur bdag
T02D3488:137a-10: sku mdog dkar mo chu skyes dkar po'i steng du
T02D3488:137a-11: zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs
T02D3488:137a-12: pa / zla ba dkar po la brten pa /
T02D3488:137a-13: lo bcu drug gi na tshod ma sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3488:137a-15: g-yon pa autpa la bsnams pa /
T02D3488:137a-16: bdud ma lus pa 'joms par mdzad pa nyid kyi
T02D3488:137a-17: sku'i pa spu'i khung bu nas sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D3488:137a-18: chub sems dpa' rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3488:137a-19: 'di lta bu'i bsgom pa la brtan par mdzad nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3488:137a-20: rang gi snying gar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po rnam par bsams la //
T02D3488:137a-21: rtsibs so so la yi ge brgyad rnam par bsams nas //
T02D3488:137a-22: dbus su sv'a h'a'i yi ge byin nas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3488:137a-24: aom t'a re tutt'a ri tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3488:137a-25: 'dis bsams pa tsam gyis bdud thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02D3488:137a-26: shes rab shin tu dri ma med //
T02D3488:137a-27: snyan ngag dang ni smra bar ldan //
T02D3488:137a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid kyis //
T02D3488:137a-29: bskal pa'i mthar yang 'tsho thabs gsungs //
T02D3488:137a-30: rgyal po'i btsun mo nang 'khor bcas //
T02D3488:137a-32: dgra rnams kun gyis thams cad du //
T02D3488:137a-33: ba spu'i bdag nyid kyang mi gcod //
T02D3488:137a-34: rdo rje sgrol ma gzi chen 'phags //
T02D3488:137a-35: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma //
T02D3488:137a-36: mkhas shing bdag nyid chen mo la //
T02D3488:137a-37: gser ram yang na dngul la sogs //
T02D3488:137a-38: yon ni dbul bar byas nas ni //
T02D3488:137a-39: mchog tu gus pas mnyan par bya //
T02D3488:137a-40: mchog gnyis ma lus thob pa ni //
T02D3488:137a-41: bla ma la gus bdag nyid mchog / de thos gyur las 'di nyid du //
T02D3488:137a-42: rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis rtag tu gsungs //
T02D3488:137a-43: gal te gzhan du dngos grub min //
T02D3488:137a-44: rgyal ba nyid kyis mngon du mdzad //
